battle_pass.name: Megalo Don
battle_pass.description: A fierce new skin featuring the Megalo Don look, part of the Battle Pass.

battle_pass.name: Pastel Brite Raider
battle_pass.description: Bright and colorful, the Pastel Brite Raider is ready to take on any challenge.

battle_pass.name: Get Nitrod
battle_pass.description: Get ready to race with the Get Nitrod skin, featuring high-octane details.

battle_pass.name: Cobalt Burn Machinist
battle_pass.description: The Cobalt Burn Machinist is equipped with advanced tech and a fierce attitude.

battle_pass.name: The Machinist
battle_pass.description: A skilled engineer, The Machinist is ready for any challenge.

battle_pass.name: Brite Raider
battle_pass.description: Brite Raider brings a splash of color to the battlefield.

battle_pass.name: Rust
battle_pass.description: Shred the wasteland with style using the Rust skin.

battle_pass.name: Hot Rod T60 Power Armor
battle_pass.description: Hot Rod T60 Power Armor brings a fiery new look to the classic armor.

battle_pass.name: Slap Peabody
battle_pass.description: Featuring characters named Phil, Earl, and Axle, Slap Peabody brings a playful vibe.

battle_pass.name: Corrosive Rust
battle_pass.description: Corrosive Rust adds a toxic twist to the classic Rust look.

bonus_battle_pass.name: Black Knight T60 Power Armor
bonus_battle_pass.description: The Black Knight T60 Power Armor combines medieval aesthetics with futuristic tech.

bonus_battle_pass.name: Night Hunter Scarr
bonus_battle_pass.description: Night Hunter Scarr is a deadly predator of the night.

magneto_quests.name: Wasteland Magneto
magneto_quests.description: Wasteland Magneto brings the master of magnetism to the desolate landscapes.

quest_rewards.name: Nitro Flare Machinist
quest_rewards.description: The Nitro Flare Machinist is ready to ignite the battlefield.

quest_rewards.name: Oxide Rust
quest_rewards.description: Oxide Rust adds a new layer of decay to the classic Rust skin.
